website_summaries.verdict: If your tot needs a little nighttime reassurance, this zebra is sure to lighten up bedtime for the whole family.
pros: Doubles as a cuddly daytime companion and comforting nightlight all in one
Zippity’s friendly face in the center projects a starry sky on ceilings and walls
Built-in timer conveniently shuts off after 20 minutes, but little ones can easily switch it on themselves
cons: With electronic components, this Dream Lites Pillow Pet is understandably firmer than original Pillow Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that my kid loves and doesn't need to be replaced often. Its resilient and doesn't go through batteries too often. It doesn't ship well however. Ours came in just its original box with no packaging to hide the product, it was not taped shut, someone simply slapped a label on the product box and shipped it. its lucky it made it here.. A shipping box would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ben,Krystal & Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed both with this item and Amazon's customer "service" policies
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughter for Christmas, and she only recently started using it. The return period has passed, and our item is defective. It does not stay on for more than a minute regardless of whether the timer is turned off. We have two more of these in Paw Patrol styles for our sons, so we are well aware of how to use these and how they are supposed to function. I'm very disappointed both with this item and Amazon's customer "service" policies.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L. Gyoerkoes

customer_reviews.title: Calming, Soft, Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This was an ideal calming, soft, cozy, distraction for my 2 year old as we eased away his milk bottle in bed at night. The developers thought of everything like a soft flap to keep exposed scratchy Velcro covered so this remains a cozy bedtime friend when it’s opened up. I also love that I can choose to leave the light on or leave it in timer mode. The lighting is not intrusive, and my 2 year old enjoys having control over what color the stars get to be. I don’t have anything negative to say at this point!
customer_reviews.author: kikibarry

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, but quality control is an issue
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves it, but our original one broke in 5 months. I just bought another, but only the green led works. Already got a label for free on Amazon for the return. Seems like QC is the issue, but it's easy on batteries, and is a cuddly toy even after the electronics stop functioning. Kid loves it so much I bought two more, which should be arriving today. Hopefully both work this time. You must coach your little one not to stare into the LEDs
customer_reviews.author: Ian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived, we put batteries in and it did not work. We tried different batteries, it still did not work. Returning the product and having a replacement sent was extremely easy! The second on we received worked perfectly! My daughter loves having this and is excited to go to bed and see all of the stars. She always falls asleep before it turns itself off, so she probably thinks it stays on all night, but I love that I don't have to go back in specifically to turn it off. We have been using it every night for many weeks and have not had to change the batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: On Easter he will receive the item / he had one before and loved it. That's why we had to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the item for our grandson , he hasn't got the toy yet. On Easter he will receive the item / he had one before and loved it. That's why we had to get a new one he worn out the old one. Quality of the toy is solid/ not fragile/ so a child could hug the toy and it would not break / really nice size/ very happy with the product. :) a very happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: We love Dream Lites!
customer_reviews.text: We love Dream Lites! My son received the dog Dream Lite for his 2nd birthday, he is now 4. He uses the light every night while he is drifting off to sleep. We purchased Zippity Zebra for my 2 year old daughter and she loves it. It is fun for her to click through the colors. She enjoys falling asleep watching the colors and will sometimes wake in the middle of the night and turn it on. This is a great little night light and I would recommend this for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: DannyZplus3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightlight
customer_reviews.text: The pillow came well packaged. Easy battery installation, requires 3 AAA. The pillow pet is soft and cuddly. It's bigger than I expected, about the half the size of the big pillow pets. It has a hard pink she'll on its back with star and moon cut outs and a zebra silhouette. The shapes are projected on the ceiling as they fade from one color to the next. This has helped my son fall asleep and stay in bed without being scared of the dark. The battery underneath has a nice fabric covering that velcros.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Family

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves hers
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the bad reviews saying it didn't work. But our works just fine & I'm so glad I bought it. My 4 year old absolutely loves it. She uses it every night. It has different colors so she can set it to her new favorite color or have it change colors by itself. It can be turned on/off or set to turn off with a timer which is perfect for bedtime. Ours has been working for half a year now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jpeg1

customer_reviews.title: Cute though
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. One was great, the other screw was completely stripped and could not be removed to add batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great effects but needs and an Adaptor
customer_reviews.text: This looks great when you put your batteries in, color changes and effect in a dark room was well enjoyed by my granddaughter, unfortunately it does not come with an DC Adaptor and consequently would cost extra to keep in batteries! I would suggest that the makers add that item so it can be enjoyed over and over again without having to change the batteries. Otherwise it is an excelent night light alternative, as long as your kid goes to sleep in 20 minutes before the timer runs out!
customer_reviews.author: William Mason

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this item. Sleeps with it every night. Plus it has a 15 minute timer so it turns off by itself.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Pets with LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize there was a plastic light in the center. I bought it for my dog so it was not a good choice for a dog due to the plastic. So I found a child to give it to and has a good home now.
customer_reviews.author: dave-o

customer_reviews.title: Love it ....
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 1/2 year old and she loooooves it! Carries it around all over (its soft) and the fact that she clicks on the light button like 150,000 times.... But it lights up her entire bedroom, it looks awesome... However, at first it was distracting at bedtime. Supposed to auto go off after 20 minutes, not if they keep clicking the button! Lol... but after she got "used" to it, she rather just snuggle with it without turning on the light. Anyway, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: EshawnC

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow pet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow pet. Very soft and well made. Matches my daughter's room perfectly. It has stars, moon pattern in 3 different colors. Blue, green, and orange. Even has a setting to where it changes those colors by itself. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great little nite lite
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this online. It got here really fast and my grandchildren are thrilled with it. They use it every night along with the other animal character one I ordered so they could each have one. I like that you have a choice to keep it on all night or just 20 minutes, long enough for them to fall asleep and then it turns itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Debi F.

customer_reviews.title: Dream Lites Are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Zippity is soooo cute! Dream Lites are simply awesome. Glad this one worked out of the box. My little one has several of these and it creates quite a light show. The only oddity was that it showed up in a generic white box and not in the packaging like you see at the store.
customer_reviews.author: nessaspud

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr old loves
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter has been using this for a couple months now and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: deer8181

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This item was really cute and half the price I would pay for it at a store like Walmart. My daughter wanted one for her birthday so I bought one for her. I was disappointed that it was broken when it arrived. I will be returning it for a new one. I also purchased the penguin pillow pet dream lites for my nephew and that worked when it arrived. I'm hoping the next one I order will work.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: Love DreamLites!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler had this one in the mini, and it ran way too fast through button batteries and didn't stay lit very long. I was tired of that, so bought this one. It takes AAA batteries and stays on way longer. She loves it! It is bright enough that you can easily see the stars on the ceiling with the nightlight even on.
customer_reviews.author: yoadri99

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: Got this b/c daughter was afraid of the dark - despite multiple night lights. Helped her to fall asleep at night, looking at the stars. Now, she barely uses it, though it remains one of the cherished few in her bed. I suppose its use now is a "last resort" use of sorts - if she can't fall asleep, she'll play with the thing - watching the lights change colors, moving the zebra closer and further to the wall to make the stars smaller/larger, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The lights are nice but not a product that hold up very long.
customer_reviews.text: We've now had 4 Pillow Peets, none of them currently work. The biggest problem we have discovered is if you use electric power the place where you plug it in at tears up eventually. Some times the timer doesn't work, and if you plan on using battery power only you should save yourself some money are purchase rechargeable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful timed night light
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful timed night light. 4 year old loves it, has multiple options for colors and it can either stay on all night or can be set to shut off after like 20 minutes. Batteries are secure with screwed on door.
customer_reviews.author: CarolandDoug

customer_reviews.title: I even love the stars on the ceiling and walls when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is turning 3 soon. It replaces the one I bought when she was a newborn. I even love the stars on the ceiling and walls when I lie down with her! Shipping was super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter liked this so much I ordered one for my other ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter liked this so much I ordered one for my other granddaughter. I clicked on buy it again. However, when it arrived it was just a pillow and not a nightlight. Beware of buying through their buy it again option.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: I love these pillow pets
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillow pets. I really like that you can set it to turn off after 20 minutes so the batteries aren't being wasted all night long. They arent to bright, just the perfect amount of glow in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: chels

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it, has 3-4 colors it can ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, has 3-4 colors it can do. She sleeps on the bottom bunk and loves seeing the stars.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseS84

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one that recently died. Unfortunately when it was unboxed and taken out of the bag, the zebra was ratty and the instructions even looked like they had gotten wet at some point. Definitely not the new quality that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne newiadomy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night light!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! I actually purchased this for a young adult with PTSD who can't sleep in the dark. It is perfect. Just the right amount of light and the size of a travel pillow (smaller than a pillow pet).
customer_reviews.author: MommyNblueland

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is on a timer to turn off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to have this at night for her nightlight. I love that it is on a timer to turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A fun nightlight.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the projection quality of this toy. Such a great gift.

customer_reviews.title: great price & fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a butterfly dream light that she's had for at least 4 years. The lights all died so we bought the zebra to go with her room decor. She loves it, great price & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: K Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it describes. The multi colored lights are a nice touch. My daughter requested this for her birthday and was exactly what she wanted and expected. It came in the time stated at ordering and the packaging was intact and undamaged. The battery life seems reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: speters

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. Lights up his ceiling in his bedroom at bedtime so he falls asleep without fear of the dark.🥰
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them and use them everynight
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th Dream Lites I have bought! My kids love them and use them everynight.
customer_reviews.author: JDA

customer_reviews.title: It does a wonderful job at displaying a beautiful array of stars on ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wanted a dream lite for quite some time now and when I saw how cheap this one was I couldn't pass it up. It does a wonderful job at displaying a beautiful array of stars on the ceiling with multiple colors, however all fur on her zebra falls out. Maybe it's just my product but it definitely shows why it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: BEST B-DAY GIFT FOR 7 YEAH OLD
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has been wanting this since they started advertising on tv but every occasion there was other items we got her. I recently purchased this for her 7th birthday and OMG you would of thought there were no other gifts. Only regrets are I wished I would of purchased sooner she loves it, it is definitely her new beddy buddie!
customer_reviews.author: cyndilouwho333

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 6-year old granddaughter. She loves the zebra. She has had the unicorn from when her room was all pink. She loves the zebra because she now has zebra striped sheets on her bed and he fits right in. Mom likes the fact that this newer version has a timer. Everyone is happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Kitto

customer_reviews.title: Might be a fake
customer_reviews.text: The blue bulb doesn't work very well. This was a replacement for another Pillow Pets Dream Lite. I am not 100% sure this is a genuine product. The labels look different and it is not as well made as our first one.
customer_reviews.author: couture fan

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Has to be close to the ceiling ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Has to be close to the ceiling for crisp light but gives a nice amount of light overall. Still doesn't help my kid sleep, but I would give 10 stars for that...
customer_reviews.author: Cahumiko

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty, exactly as it claims
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it claims to be and do. It is soft with the hard center for the lights. Also with fresh batteries the lights are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: RoseB

customer_reviews.title: ... was bent and busted but other than that I'm happy. Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was bent and busted but other than that I'm happy. Great for little ones, my baby girl loves looking at the shadows it creates! *2 months this month!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came on time and looks like it will be an enjoyable toy for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for neice. It came on time and looks like it will be an enjoyable toy for her.

customer_reviews.title: Great nightlight and snuggle friend
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My 3 youngest kiddos have one and it definitely helps provide comfort for them to get to sleep.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's friend for her birthday. Gave the gift monday and found out today it doesn't work. Her mom put batteries in and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My daughter loves it. I like that you can have it turn off on its own after awhile. I'd buy from this company again.

customer_reviews.title: It does work just fine, pretty sure grandson will love it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the zebra, got the turtle, same price so that's ok I guess. It does work just fine, pretty sure grandson will love it. I would have gave 5 stars if I had got the correct one...

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I liked this Dream lite but it stopped working in a month. I was very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and works well, but not nearly enough for the price. It's good for the nightlight aspect, but way too hard for a pillow. It's much smaller than I had expected, but that's my fault for not looking at the dimensions. Overall, I would recommend buying it at a store so you can see and feel if it is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kodabelle

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Pet
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea we bought this for our daughter and she really loves it we are pleased with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great price! My daughter loves this and so do I because I have my bed back now. This made it so much easier for her to sleep in her own room.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and arrived when said as promised.

customer_reviews.title: My little one loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 21 month old daughter and she loved! She goes to bed with it everynight, and loves to play with it in the dark!

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Such fast shipping! It arrived a week early. Packaging is great and product is very soft and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Best X mas gift for  my kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My kids ages 4, 3, & 17 months each got a dream lite pillow pet for Christmas. Now 3 weeks later they use it each night, so I would say my money was well spent. I don't see a need for the wall charger unless it's not going to be moved. It helps keep them in their rooms at night.

customer_reviews.title: She has had it several weeks now and it is still working fine. Hope to get much use from it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her "Zeebie". She has had it several weeks now and it is still working fine. Hope to get much use from it. The first one she was given as a birthday gift was broken and we returned it to the store. So glad to find one at such a good price on line.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect, exactly what I was looking for and arrived earlier then expected!

customer_reviews.title: Big ol' pile of meh.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with it, but daughter didn't like it at all. It sits uselessly on her bed. She never uses it.

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good option to a night light. I like how it will turn itself off. And, my girls love watching the lights on the ceiling. It has very good projection.
customer_reviews.author: gmdenali

customer_reviews.title: A hit at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter wanted this so bad. She didn't want the unicorn, butterfly or lady bug. Ot had to be the zebra. Heer face lit up when she saw it christmas morning. She hasnt put it down since
customer_reviews.author: Cydne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great, the grandkids love'em. Hopefully they will last a long time. They are made pretty good. We have two more on the way so we will probably buy more in the next year or so.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I got a pillow pet with no lights only the pillow now my daughter is crying thanks alot...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Zippy Zebra lights up a dark room.
customer_reviews.text: The Zippy Zebra is what my little sister wanted for her birthday. She loves it. She is afraid of the dark in her bedroom @ night & now feels secure & goes right to sleep. I know 2 other kids that love the pillow pets. Each child chose a different pet. Nice selection.

customer_reviews.title: Cutee
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My daughter instantly fell in love with it. It arrived on time.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the soft light from this cute pillow. My only negative comment would be the cost. It was expensive compared to other kinds of dream lites but she loves zebras. It is very cute, though,

customer_reviews.title: Love dream lites
customer_reviews.text: I have always like dream lites. My kids love the stars it portrays on the ceiling, it's adorable, and matches my daughters room perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Earns it stripes

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter had been asking for one of these, but I just couldn't see spending $30 for one. When I saw it on this site I thought maybe this was the smaller one, but I ordered it anyway. Pleasantly surprised that it was the exact one that she had been asking for. The package arrived a lot sooner than expected and everything went smoothly. Thanks so much.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The lights are bright and my 3 year old loves it in her big girl bed :)

customer_reviews.title: Dream lites
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter birthday and she loves it.. I find it comforting that she no longer likes a night light on

customer_reviews.text: This little guy is the perfect little friend for our Zebra-loving granddaughter! The lights are very relaxing at night, especially on 'random'.

customer_reviews.text: She loves it. 6 year old niece loved it as well. Thanks for helping me retain my "greatest aunt ever" status.

customer_reviews.text: This is cute but even in the stores I think this product in General is over priced daughter loves it though

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but....
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and I mean it is bright very bright. The plastic cover is not comfortable to lie on. More of a dresser item than a bed item.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly presented.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was happy with her gift however it was sent to me in an envelope, very poorly protected . The plastic protector on the back was missing. I went to the store to see how it was packed originally. All the pilow pets were in a box and the lighted area was protected. I immediately put a battery to make sure the toy was working and it was. It really did not look like a new toy.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Zippity Zebra Dream Lite for my stepdaughter for her birthday. The item arrived on time... However, the item I received was NOT the Zippity Zebra. It was the giraffe. I decided to keep it & give it to her anyway, as it was a last minute addition to her birthday gifts. She does love it, but I was a little disappointed that I didn't receive what I ordered.

customer_reviews.title: Battery only
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like about this is that it can only be powered by batteries. Wish I was able to plug it in. One more thing to buy batteries for.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After months of begging for a Zebra Dream lite - we finally got our 3 year old daughter on for Christmas. She was SO excited! Sadly, when we put the batteries in, the zebra glowed for a minute, did not alternate colors, and then stopped working all together. We tried several different batteries, and did everything we could to fix the situation, but she was very disappointed. We are now awaiting 'approval' to return the Dream lite to the company and get a new one. I guess the North Pole is busy this week..
customer_reviews.author: Cára

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very disappointed on her birthday party when her favorite gift didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was supposed to be new but it came used and did not work there was corrosion in the battery case. My daughter was very disappointed on her birthday party when her favorite gift didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great present for kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the Granddaughter. She couldn't wait to get it open, batteries installed and a to find a dark place to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sinn

customer_reviews.title: it's fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It was tricky figuring out how to turn it off but other than that, it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Briesemeister

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loveds it it lights up on the ceiling and she loves it. Great for the little ones who needs a night light
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Irwin

product_meta.title: Pillow Pets Dream Lites Stuffed Animals - Zippity Zebra 11"
product_meta.description: Brand New 100% Authentic Pillow Pets Dream Lite AS SEEN ON TV and comes with all original Tags. In stock and ready to ship within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: MAKE BED TIME FUN : Pillow Pet Dream Lites are the amazing nightlights that turn your room into a starry sky instantly. Simply press the button and your pet will project a starry sky on your ceiling and walls.

NO MORE FEAR OF THE DARK: With this beautiful Pillow Pet your little one will not feel alone in the dark. The soft light from the toy creates a magical and tranquil environment that helps kids ease into a restful sleep.
PERFECT FOR PLAYTIME: This sweet pillow pet is perfect for playtime. Your little one will enjoy folding this toy into a pet or opening it to lay flat.
SLEEP TIMER OPTION: The Pillow Pet Dream Lite features a 20 minute sleep timer that shuts off light automatically after 20 minutes so you do not have to turn it off when you kid falls asleep.

MULTICOLOR: All the DreamLites come with 4 light options: steady blue, amber, or green and the 4th is all three colors that transition every 4 seconds continually in a loop. The face of the particular pet is also projected along with the stars. Runs on 3 AAA Batteries (not included).
